title: Table Filter Filter
description: Configuration for the Okapi Table Filter Filter

configurations.name: Table Files
configurations.description: Table-like files such as tab-delimited, CSV, fixed-width columns, etc.

configurations.name: Table (Comma-Separated Values)
configurations.description: Comma-separated values, optional header with field names.
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
unescapeSource.b=true
trimLeading.b=true
trimTrailing.b=true
preserveWS.b=false
useCodeFinder.b=false
codeFinderRules=#v1$0a$count.i=2$0a$rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]$0a$rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v$0a$sample=$0a$useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
wrapMode.i=0
columnNamesLineNum.i=1
valuesStartLineNum.i=2
detectColumnsMode.i=0
numColumns.i=1
sendHeaderMode.i=1
trimMode.i=1
sendColumnsMode.i=2
sourceIdColumns=
sourceColumns=
targetColumns=
commentColumns=
commentSourceRefs=
recordIdColumn.i=0
sourceIdSourceRefs=
sourceIdSuffixes=
targetLanguages=
targetSourceRefs=
fieldDelimiter=,
textQualifier="
removeQualifiers.b=true
parametersClass=net.sf.okapi.filters.table.csv.Parameters

configurations.name: Haiku CatKeys
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
unescapeSource.b=false
trimLeading.b=false
trimTrailing.b=false
preserveWS.b=true
useCodeFinder.b=true
codeFinderRules=#v1$0a$count.i=2$0a$rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]$0a$rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v$0a$sample=$0a$useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
wrapMode.i=0
columnNamesLineNum.i=0
valuesStartLineNum.i=2
detectColumnsMode.i=2
numColumns.i=4
sendHeaderMode.i=0
trimMode.i=0
sendColumnsMode.i=1
sourceIdColumns=
sourceColumns=1
targetColumns=4
commentColumns=3
commentSourceRefs=1
recordIdColumn.i=0
sourceIdSourceRefs=
sourceIdSuffixes=
targetLanguages=
targetSourceRefs=1
fieldDelimiter=	
textQualifier=%%%^^^$$$nonenonenone$$$^^^%%%
removeQualifiers.b=false
parametersClass=net.sf.okapi.filters.table.csv.Parameters

configurations.name: Table (Fixed-Width Columns)
configurations.description: Fixed-width columns table padded with white-spaces.
configurations.parametersRaw:
#v1
unescapeSource.b=true
trimLeading.b=false
trimTrailing.b=false
preserveWS.b=true
useCodeFinder.b=false
codeFinderRules=#v1$0a$count.i=2$0a$rule0=%(([-0+#]?)[-0+#]?)((\d\$)?)(([\d\*]*)(\.[\d\*]*)?)[dioxXucsfeEgGpn]$0a$rule1=(\\r\\n)|\\a|\\b|\\f|\\n|\\r|\\t|\\v$0a$sample=$0a$useAllRulesWhenTesting.b=false
wrapMode.i=0
columnNamesLineNum.i=1
valuesStartLineNum.i=2
detectColumnsMode.i=0
numColumns.i=1
sendHeaderMode.i=0
trimMode.i=2
sendColumnsMode.i=2
sourceIdColumns=
sourceColumns=
targetColumns=
commentColumns=
commentSourceRefs=
recordIdColumn.i=0
sourceIdSourceRefs=
sourceIdSuffixes=
targetLanguages=
targetSourceRefs=
columnStartPositions=
columnEndPositions=
parametersClass=net.sf.okapi.filters.table.fwc.Parameters

simplifierRules.description: Simplifier rules for code type normalization
